item.title: Kubernetes Web Deployments, a love story
item.description: _ Note: The names in this story are modified to as to not disclose the identity of those involved. _ Background In my working history I’ve seen some incidents that spark joy in the frightening edge cases that they illuminate. This short tale is about web deployments with kubernetes, and a lesser known evil of sending an orchestrator to do a CDN’s job. Situation I saw a ping one day in our engineering channel that our web deploy was stuck.
